page.title: 10COCKLAKES FACTORY,COTEHILL
page.content: My dad used to work at Cocklakes.He operated a pulverizer to get the rock out.Then he made plaster and plaster board .They got the gypsum from Cocklakes mine. Then they got it from Cotehill quarry. Later rock was brought from Kirby Thore .The factory was built in 1930 and it started production soon after.My dad helped to make the big shed there.It was dusty and noisy and there were 300 people working there. The mine shut down then there were only 120-150 people there.The factory shut down in 1980.Now its used for the pipeline. Then it will be abandoned.
